name: KinkSwipe MVP Completion & Polish
description: Complete the MVP with custom categories, toast notifications, i18n improvements, bundle optimization, and comprehensive testing.

userStories.title: Fix SwipeScreen Tests
userStories.description: As a developer, I want all SwipeScreen tests to pass correctly so that I have confidence in the automated tests.
acceptanceCriteria: All 13 tests in SwipeScreen.test.tsx pass
Tests use @testing-library/user-event to simulate swipe gestures
Mock of react-tinder-card is correctly configured
Tests cover: swipe directions, rating updates, navigation, both mode
Tests are deterministic and not flaky
npm run lint passes
npm run test passes for SwipeScreen tests
npx tsc --noEmit passes (no TypeScript errors)

userStories.title: Implement Custom Categories & Activities
userStories.description: As a user, I want to add my own custom categories and activities so that the app reflects my unique preferences.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Custom button in SummaryScreen opens a dialog modal
Dialog allows creating new category with name
Within category, activities can be added with: name (required), description (optional), edge flag (checkbox)
Custom categories are saved to localStorage
Custom activities appear in summary alongside default activities
Validation: name not empty, category minimum 1 activity
Custom items can be edited and deleted
npm run lint passes
npx tsc --noEmit passes (no TypeScript errors)
Verify in browser that custom categories save and load correctly

userStories.title: Add Toast Notifications
userStories.description: As a user, I want to receive clear visual feedback when I copy links, export results, or errors occur so that I can confirm my actions worked.
acceptanceCriteria: Toast notification system implemented (using shadcn/ui sonner or similar)
Toast appears on successful share link copy
Toast appears on successful text summary copy
Toast appears on successful image download
Error toast appears when copy/export actions fail
Toast has variants: success (green), error (red)
Toast auto-dismisses after 3-5 seconds
Replace all TODO comments for toast notifications in SummaryScreen
npm run lint passes
npx tsc --noEmit passes (no TypeScript errors)
Verify in browser that toasts appear and dismiss correctly

userStories.title: Complete i18n Translations
userStories.description: As a Spanish or Thai-speaking user, I want all text translated correctly so that I have a native experience in my language.
acceptanceCriteria: Add tutorial.* keys to all strings-*.ts files: title, heading, description, swipeRight, swipeUp, swipeDown, swipeLeft, dismissHint
Add footer.* keys to all strings-*.ts files: home, resetAll
No hardcoded English text in components
Spanish translations added to strings-es.ts
Thai translations added to strings-th.ts
FooterNavigation.tsx uses t.footer.* instead of hardcoded text
TutorialCard.tsx uses t.tutorial.* instead of hardcoded text
npm run lint passes
npx tsc --noEmit passes (no TypeScript errors)
Verify in browser that all text displays correctly in EN, ES, TH

userStories.title: Code Splitting & Bundle Optimization
userStories.description: As a mobile user, I want the app to load quickly and use minimal bandwidth so that I have a smooth experience even on slow connections.
acceptanceCriteria: Main bundle reduced from 685KB to <400KB
Lazy loading implemented for heavy screens (SwipeScreen, SummaryScreen, LoadFromLink)
Manual chunks configured for large libraries: framer-motion, html2canvas, lz-string
Chunk size warning eliminated or mitigated
Time to interactive (TTI) reduced by >30%
Optimized build completes without breaking changes
npm run lint passes
npm run build completes successfully
npx tsc --noEmit passes (no TypeScript errors)
Verify in browser that lazy loading screens load correctly on demand

userStories.title: Comprehensive Testing & QA
userStories.description: As a user, I want all app functionality to work correctly without bugs or errors so that I have a reliable experience.
acceptanceCriteria: All 97 tests pass (100% pass rate)
Zero TypeScript errors
Zero ESLint warnings
Production build completes successfully without critical warnings
Manual testing completed on: Desktop (Chrome, Safari, Firefox), Mobile Safari (iOS), Mobile Chrome (Android), Small viewport (iPhone SE), Large viewport (Desktop)
E2E flows validated: Onboarding complete (give/receive/both), Swipe all categories, Summary and export, Load from link, Reset state
Edge cases tested: URL with invalid payload, No localStorage (private mode), Language change during swipe, Navigation interruption (back button)
Lighthouse score >90 on mobile
First Contentful Paint <1.5s
Time to Interactive <3s
Total Bundle Size <500KB gzipped

npm run test passes (all 97 tests)
npm run build passes
npx tsc --noEmit passes (no TypeScript errors)
